pages.text: MIMI stores MIDI files on disk in the configuration directory in certain instances.

pages.title: Web Cache
pages.text: When web MIDI files are enabled and players play a Floppy Disk in a Broadcaster block the server downloads the MIDI files from the disk URL and caches it for future plays.$(br2)Cached MIDI files are saved in your Minecraft instance $(#0046ff)config$() folder under $(#0046ff)mimi/music_cache$().$(br2)Cached files can be deleted at any time as long as the server is not running.$(br2)

pages.title: Default Music
pages.text: Floppy Disks can also be created that point to a MIDI file saved on the server permanently, rather than a web URL.$(br2)To add MIDI files to your server open the default music folder in your Minecraft instance $(#0046ff)config$() folder under $(#0046ff)mimi/default_music$().$(br2)The files in this folder are refreshed when the server starts and can be deleted when the server is not running.$(br2)
